“I can assure you we’re not withholding money for future disasters.”

What's wrong with this picture, all we hear is the crazy labor lefties go on all day about how Bridget McKenzie giving money to sporting clubs but we don't hear a word about the donated funds to the Red Cross not paying victims of the bushfires.
